name: Spell Of Respor
description:
Info

This game has been made for the SAE Institute Game Jam. It has been developed by a team of six over a period of three weeks (15.09. - 06.10.2020).

The themes we could choose from were 'Glitch' and 'Respawn', we chose both.

This game has been made with Unreal Engine 4.

Controls Controller Mouse & Keyboard
  • RMB - Hold to aim/Release to fire
  • LMB - Melee attack
  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • Mouse - Aim direction
  • R - Reset puzzle
  • Q - Set spawnpoint 1/Teleport to Spawnpoint 1
  • E - Set spawnpoint 2/Teleport to Spawnpoint 2
  • Esc - Pause
